content.title: News and Updates about COVID-19 and The Meeting House.
content.description: Responding to this pandemic has made life different for all of us. As we navigate this new normal, we've made several changes to serve our communities well and love those who are struggling during this difficult time.

image1.alt: Young woman in a face mask is sitting and smiling off camera as she talks to a friend.
Young man in a face mask is sitting and talking with friends.

content.text1: Responding to this pandemic has made life different for all of us. As we navigate the new normal, we've made several changes to serve our communities and love those who are struggling during this difficult time.
Our purpose and vision haven't changed, but we've made the following transitions for the forseeable future.

list.title: Sunday Service
list.text: We'll continue live-streaming our services every Sunday at 10:00am EDT on our website for at least the rest of 2020. We've got incredible music, stories, and teaching lined up, as well as a live chat with awesome hosts. We can't wait to connect with you this Sunday.
list.imageAlt: Watching the teaching from Bruxy Cavey during The Meeting House Sunday morning livestream.

list.title: Home Church
list.text: During the week, we come together in smaller groups to share life, grow deeper spiritual friendships, and create an open dialogue about how we can live the Jesus-centred life. Our Home Churches will continue to meet online. Click here to find a group you can connect with.
list.imageAlt: Online home church meeting using zoom.

list.title: Kids
list.text: Our Kidmax program and curriculum for infants to Grade 5 is available online. The latest video curriculum for Grades 1-5 is located in the teaching section of our website and will also be added to our live-stream page every Sunday morning. You can access the activities and lesson plans (updated weekly) by clicking here.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

list.title: Youth
list.text: Our Jr High and Sr High video curriculum is available online. All midweek youth programming has transitioned to online. To connect with a local youth pastor or coordinator and get details about online midweek programming, click here and select your location.
list.imageAlt: A high school student is exploring nature by himself.

image1.alt: A woman is on her phone outside.

content.text1: Pausing in-person Sunday services impacts the donations we receive and need to fund our ministry. Thank you for your continued generosity during this difficult season as we care for people in new ways and help them meaningfully engage with the good news of Jesus.

image1.alt: A viewer is watching The Meeting House livestream on their laptop.
A man sitting outside on a ledge and looking up at the sky.

content.text2: Make sure you get all the latest news and announcements and know about all the new resources and media we're creating. Subscribe to our email list today.
